name: ong-transformar-site
description: Site institucional da ONG Transformar - entrega com foco em acessibilidade e build para produção

scripts.build:html: html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/index.html index.html && html-minifier-terser -o dist/projetos.html projetos.html && html-minifier-terser -o dist/cadastro.html cadastro.html
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.test:a11y: pa11y http://127.0.0.1:8080 && pa11y http://127.0.0.1:8080/projetos.html && pa11y http://127.0.0.1:8080/cadastro.html
scripts.test:a11y:report: pa11y http://127.0.0.1:8080 --reporter html > pa11y-report-index.html && pa11y http://127.0.0.1:8080/projetos.html --reporter html > pa11y-report-projetos.html && pa11y http://127.0.0.1:8080/cadastro.html --reporter html > pa11y-report-cadastro.html
scripts.test:axe:report: npx @axe-core/cli http://127.0.0.1:8080 --save --output-file=axe-report.json --output=html && mv axe-report.html axe-report-index.html || true
